name: It Hypes
description:
Now available for android too!About the Game

Welcome to a 3d infinite platformer game, where you control a red block and dodge the green blocks. Also don't fall off the edge. You have some abilities which will help you survive longer. You have only one goal: 

"Dodge from Death as It Hypes!" What's new in beta 0.2?
  • Modified scoring system
  • Added multiple resolution and lower quality settings for low-end pc support
  • Fixed minor bugs
